message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $82. It's a fair compromise, considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $70. Can you meet me at $75?
I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer it to you for $79. It's the highest I can go without losing too much profit.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still hoping to get a better deal. Can you meet me at $76?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $78. This is as low as I can go.
I understand you're at your minimum price, Alice, but I'm still hoping to get a good deal. Can you meet me at $77?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised a lot, and I need to make a profit. I'm sticking to my original offer of $82.
I understand you're sticking to your original offer, but I'm still hoping to get a good deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $77 and $82, which is $79.50. Can you meet me at that price?
